mapper.insert: insert into t_acctbk_seq (id, open_id, child_id, type, money, remark, create_date) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{childId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{money,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update t_acctbk_seq set open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, child_id = #{childId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, money = #{money,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, open_id, child_id, type, money, remark, create_date from t_acctbk_seq
select id, open_id, child_id, type, money, remark, create_date from t_acctbk_seq where open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
